column4: Hey guys, I have a big problem when I want to install apps or open synaptic pkg mng and ... error msg is: E: Could not open file /var/lib/dpkg/status - open (2: No such file or directory)
do you have any other program that uses dpkg opened, such as another instance of synaptic, the upgrades...?
no problem is not for opening other package manager! status directory missed!
I tried to mv status-old but cannot do it!
any idea?!
no idea, sorry... when did it happen?
30minutes ago!
after installing something or doing something?
I dont know :(
I would try rebooting before anything else
how can I do?
shut down applet > Reboot > OK
haha! I know that, I reboot it before come here :P
oh, ok...
I resend my problem, Hope someone can help me. anyway tnx alot man :)
have you checked that the PC is plugged? XD ...no, really,   ls -l /var/lib/dpkg/
I have not any status dir
don't know much about dpkg, but I think that's waaay weird
alternatives , info , parts , triggers and updates are the directories in here
dunno in lucid, but at least in jaunty /var/lib/dpkg/status is a file, not a folder
yup may be its a file, anyway no file and no directory what named status
what were you doing before it disappeared? did you install something or did something weird?
I think, I removed the status file :(
